author: Andreas
content: Yup! Especially when it's a high-level production as certainly for this poster was the case. AndrÃ© Heller is one of the most respected and famous artists in Austria, and when he produces a circus show, he'll certainly work with first-rate photographers. Thus I guess with this particular poster, the chance to step on someone's toes who can afford a suit is pretty high ðŸ™‚
